description_txt: stated on November 23, 2014 in an interview on ABC's "This Week":
quote_txt: Says "99 percent of the time police officers aren't charged when they kill young people of color."

description_txt: stated on November 24, 2014 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: "Turkeys today weigh 29.8 pounds. In the ‘30s, they weighed 13.2 pounds."

description_txt: stated on November 17, 2014 in a broadcast of MSNBC's "The Rachel Maddow Show":
quote_txt: On immigration, what reports say President Barack Obama "plans to do is roughly on the same scale" as what President George H.W. Bush did.

description_txt: stated on November 18, 2014 in a campaign website:
quote_txt: "The NRA supported background checks..."

description_txt: stated on November 20, 2014 in a meme on social media:
quote_txt: A sign in Dearborn, Mich., for the Advancement of Islamic Agenda for America says, "Allah be praised. America we will kill you all and nothing you can do to stop it."

description_txt: stated on November 11, 2014 in an interview:
quote_txt: In "the past four or five" presidential elections, "people who poll high at the beginning are not the people who end up being the nominees."

description_txt: stated on November 23, 2014 in an interview on CNN's "State of the Union":
quote_txt: "There are more people living in this country who were not born here than at anytime in the history of the country."

description_txt: stated on November 12, 2014 in a Journal commentary:
quote_txt: "In Rhode Island, a recent study showed that among a group of people who had been homeless for a year or more, Medicaid costs averaged about $60,000 per person."
footer: By C. Eugene Emery Jr. • November 23, 2014

description_txt: stated on November 20, 2014 in a speech announcing new immigration actions:
quote_txt: "The actions I’m taking" are "the kinds of actions taken by every single Republican president and every single Democratic president for the past half-century."

description_txt: stated on November 12, 2014 in a forum:
quote_txt: In rural Virginia, "Sen. Warner ran 8-10 points ahead of a traditional Democrat -- ahead of Senator Kaine, ahead of Governor McAuliffe."

description_txt: stated on November 12, 2014 in a press conference including mayoral candidate Mike Martinez:
quote_txt: Austin mayoral candidate Steve Adler opposed an injunction to stop a "company from dumping petrochemicals directly into the Barton Springs aquifer."

description_txt: stated on November 12, 2014 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: "Fox News uses photo of a married couple promoting ‘traditional marriage’ and the photo is actually of a same-sex couple."

description_txt: stated on November 5, 2014 in an interview:
quote_txt: In Wisconsin, unions can essentially give "unlimited" contributions to political parties, but business can't give any.

description_txt: stated on November 19, 2014 in an interview on Fox News:
quote_txt: In the 2014 elections, "the American people overwhelmingly said we don't want Obamacare … and we don't want amnesty."

description_txt: stated on November 11, 2014 in an opinion piece:
quote_txt: Scott Walker "couldn’t get his own party" to back more than a 500-student increase in Milwaukee’s school choice program, but in Indiana, "Mitch Daniels’ voucher program is approaching 30,000 students two years after opening."

description_txt: stated on November 16, 2014 in a press conference in Australia.:
quote_txt: "My position hasn’t changed" on using executive authority to address immigration issues.

description_txt: stated on November 20, 2014 in a speech:
quote_txt: The Orange County, Florida, school board "voted to make it impossible for a student to receive a grade below 50."

description_txt: stated on November 14, 2014 in a press conference in Burma:
quote_txt: Keystone XL allows "Canada to pump their oil, send it through our land, down to the Gulf, where it will be sold everywhere else."

description_txt: stated on November 11, 2014 in an interview for a news story:
quote_txt: Austin mayoral candidate Steve Adler has "never been active in anything that has to do with City Hall."

description_txt: stated on November 8, 2014 in a tweet:
quote_txt: The majority of revenue generated by a proposed Kenosha casino would be sent to the Seminole tribe in Florida.

description_txt: stated on September 15, 2014 in forum with Florida State students:
quote_txt: Says he has "never received any contributions from the Koch brothers."

description_txt: stated on November 7, 2014 in a segment on his RT show:
quote_txt: "The Kochs stand to make around $100 billion if the government approves the Keystone XL pipeline."

description_txt: stated on November 16, 2014 in Brisbane, Australia, for the G20 summit:
quote_txt: Says Jonathan Gruber was "some adviser who never worked on our staff."

description_txt: stated on November 12, 2014 in a media availability:
quote_txt: The climate-change agreement between the United States and China "requires the Chinese to do nothing at all for 16 years."

description_txt: stated on September 8, 2014 in an annual study:
quote_txt: Georgia ranks No. 9 in the rate of women murdered by men.

description_txt: stated on November 13, 2014 in an interview on MSNBC's "The Ed Show":
quote_txt: "4.7 million people have lost their insurance in 32 states" due to Obamacare.

description_txt: stated on November 13, 2014 in a broadcast of MSNBC's "The Ed Show":
quote_txt: Repeal of Obamacare would "take away health care for 10.3 million Americans" who have received coverage since Oct. 1, 2013.

description_txt: stated on November 16, 2014 in a press conference after the G20 summit:
quote_txt: "Over the last few years, we’ve put more people back to work than all the other advanced economies combined."

description_txt: stated on November 10, 2014 in an Atlanta Journal-Constitution story:
quote_txt: Georgia has some of the highest gas taxes in the Southeast but one of the lowest taxes on gasoline for transportation in the nation.

description_txt: stated on November 2, 2014 in a web post:
quote_txt: "Congress Approves Bill Offering Free Cars To Welfare Recipients."
